reports.title: name="Watch_Dogs 2" appid="447040" target_framerate="30-39 FPS title="Watch Dogs 2 performance overview and settings on Steam Deck."

data.summary: Watch Dogs 2 performance overview and settings on Steam Deck.
data.game_display_settings:
- **Window Mode:** Fullscreen
- **Resolution:** 1280x800
- **Monitor Refresh Rate:** 60
- **V-Sync:** Off
- **In-Game FPS Limit:** 40
- **Field of View:** 70 Degrees
- **Pixel Density:** 1.00
- **Geometry:** Very High
- **Extra Details:** 0%
- **Terrain:** High
- **Vegetation:** High
- **Texture Resolution:** High
- **Texture Filtering:** Very High
- **Shadows:** High
- **Headlight Shadows:** Off
- **Water:** High
- **Reflections:** High
- **Screenspace Reflections:** Very High
- **Dynamic Particles:** On
- **San Francisco Fog:** Enabled
- **Depth of Field:** On
- **Motion Blur:** On
- **Bloom:** On
- **Ambient Occlusion:** SSBC
- **Temporal Filtering:** Off
- **Multisample Anti-Aliasing:** Off
- **Post-Process Anti-Aliasing:** FXAA
data.additional_notes: The game is playable at a locked 30 FPS with minor stutters during intense vehicle chases and frametime issues if locked to 40 FPS. While this setup focuses on achieving high graphical fidelity over higher frame rates, the experience is still enjoyable.
